src:
WTO godkänner kinesiska sanktioner mot USA
Världshandelsorganisationen, WTO, har godkänt kinesiska handelssanktioner mot USA till ett värde om 3,6 miljarder dollar, motsvarande 34 miljarder kronor. Det rapporterar Bloomberg News.
01 Nov 2019, 15:17 by Nyhetsbyrån Direkt

text:
The WTO approves Chinese sanctions against the United States
The World Trade Organization (WTO) has approved Chinese trade sanctions against the US worth $ 3.6 billion, equivalent to SEK 34 billion. That's what Bloomberg News reports.
01 Nov 2019, 15:17 by News Agency Direct
